safetyTips: Gloves provided for try any products. Social distance maintained.
name: PODPLUS SPORTS SHOP & INJURY CLINIC
description: Podplus is offering a distance doorstep gait analysis shoe fitting and free delivery of footwear. Recommendations can still be given for posted items via static gait assessment pictures. Just email or leave us an answer phone. No collections, our premises is closed at present.  Book via email preferably but also by phone.
